casebody.data:
TREJO
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER RETIREMENT SYSTEM DIVISION 420P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 23, 2018 *761Susannah P. Holloway, Assistant Attorney General, M. A. Kelly Chambers, Special Deputy Attorney General, James W. Doggett, Deputy Solicitor General, for NC Department of State Treasurer Retirement Systems Division. Branch W. Vincent, III, Attorney at Law, Southern Shores, John R. Taylor, Attorney at Law, Robert E. Zaytoun, Attorney at Law, Matthew D. Ballew, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Trejo, Stephanie T.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of January 2018 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of January 2018."
